argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | znval2.s | |- S = ( RSpan ` ZZring ) |
| 2 |  | znval2.u | |- U = ( ZZring /s ( ZZring ~QG ( S ` { N } ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | znval2.y | |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( Base ` U ) = ( Base ` U ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_znbas2 | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( Base ` U ) = ( Base ` Y ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_znadd | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( +g ` U ) = ( +g ` Y ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ ( x e. ( Base ` U ) /\ y e. ( Base ` U ) ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` U ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` Y ) y ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_znmul | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( .r ` U ) = ( .r ` Y ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ ( x e. ( Base ` U ) /\ y e. ( Base ` U ) ) ) -> ( x ( .r ` U ) y ) = ( x ( .r ` Y ) y ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 5, 7, 9 | #P_zrhpropd | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( ZRHom ` U ) = ( ZRHom ` Y ) ) |
